title: Modern 1 bed in Charlestown near Orange Line T
posting_body: Live minutes from public transportation, major highways, and tons of great shops, restaurants, and entertainment in Sullivan Square.
- Floating bathroom vanities with integral sinks, and tile floors.
- Meeting room/business area with flexible furniture for events
- Package concierge & separate package room accessible with electronic notification
- Two bike rooms to accommodate 1 bike per resident
- Convenient On-Site Retail includes Element Spa and Tradesman Coffee & Lounge
- Ample additional bike storage on adjacent campus
- Interior dog wash + secured exterior dog run areas accessible from the garage
- Lounge, catering kitchen including a communal dining space
- Fitness Center with separate studio space
- Large plant filled courtyard with 2 gas grills, a gas-fired fire pit, a variety of lounge seating and seating areas, and resident gardens
- Oversized Laundry room for larger items
Utilities: Water/sewer, trash included in rent
**Rent prices and availability are subject to change**
Contact Dave from Hartley Realty Group for a showing today!
I have knowledge of every luxury rental building in the greater Boston area, and also have access to hundreds of individually owned condos/apartments for rent!

I have listings that are convenient to: Boston, Back Bay, Bay Village, Beacon Hill, The Fenway, Kenmore, Longwood (BIDMC, BCH, DFCI, BW, SRH) Boston Common, Theater District, Financial District, North End, Waterfront, Seaport District, Fort Point, South Boston, South End, West End, MGH, BMC, Chinatown, Leather District, Allston, Brighton, Charlestown, Cambridge, Kendall, MIT, Central Square, Inman Square, Porter Square, Davis Square, Lechmere, Cambridgeside Galleria, Harvard Square, Fresh Pond, Alewife, North Cambridge, Dorchester, Quincy, East Boston, Medford, Somerville, Brookline, Chestnut Hill, Watertown, Waltham, Newton, Red Line, Orange Line, Green Line, Silver Line, Blue Line.
